Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/DateTime/incrementSeconds
Synopsis Increment the seconds by a given amount or by 1.
Function
  1. datetime incrementSeconds(datetime dt, int n)
  2. datetime incrementSeconds(datetime dt)
Usage import DateTime;
Examples 
rascal>import DateTime;
ok
rascal>N = now();
datetime: $2013-11-05T02:28:05.266+01:00$
rascal>incrementSeconds(N);
datetime: $2013-11-05T02:28:06.266+01:00$
rascal>incrementSeconds(N, 5);
datetime: $2013-11-05T02:28:10.266+01:00$
